projects.name: Smart Gym
projects.description: Smart Gym is a full-stack MERN application for gym management, featuring QR code check-ins, class booking, member and trainer profiles, and a café ordering system with Stripe integration.
features: Membership tiers and subscription flow with Stripe
Café ordering system with integrated checkout

projects.name: Codezilla
projects.description: Codezilla is a gamified coding challenge platform that blends gameplay and AI. Players log in, traverse a game map, and face AI-generated coding battles. OpenAI powers quirky minion battles and the final showdown with Codezilla, while accuracy and speed determine leaderboard rankings.
features: Interactive gameplay with a global leaderboard

projects.name: Chaos Coordinator
projects.description: Chaos Coordinator is a professional home cleaning and organizing service offering residential cleaning, laundry help, organization assistance, errand-running, companion care, home & pet sitting, and specialty cleaning services. This is a live business site (marketing/bookings) rather than an open-source project.

projects.name: DevUniverse
projects.description: DevUniverse is a minimalist ambient developer dashboard built to stay in the background while empowering focused work — combining mantra messaging, real-time note-taking, and lightweight task extraction.
features: Mantra welcome screen setting the tone
Detection of `todo:` entries and `::todo` trigger for task modal
Calm, focused UI designed for minimal distraction
projects.notes: Uses localStorage for persistence; no user accounts or database backend.

general_questions.question: What is your primary tech stack?
general_questions.answer: My primary tech stack includes React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for full-stack web applications, with additional experience in TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Stripe integrations.

general_questions.question: Do you have experience with AI integrations?
general_questions.answer: Yes, I integrated OpenAI into Codezilla to generate real-time coding challenges, blending gameplay with AI-powered assessments.

general_questions.question: Do you work with payments or e-commerce?
general_questions.answer: Yes, in Smart Gym I implemented Stripe for handling café purchases and membership subscriptions, including checkout flows and receipt handling.

general_questions.question: Where can I see more of your work?
general_questions.answer: You can explore my projects on my GitHub profile (https://github.com/OutsideofemiT) and on my personal portfolio website.

general_questions.question: What are your soft skills?
general_questions.answer: I bring strong collaboration, problem-solving, and adaptability skills from working in team-based projects like Codezilla and Smart Gym, where communication and agile workflows were key.

general_questions.question: What motivates your work?
general_questions.answer: I’m passionate about building applications that combine functionality with user-centered design, and I enjoy blending creativity with problem-solving to deliver meaningful solutions.

general_questions.question: Do you have any certifications or current studies?
general_questions.answer: Yes, I hold certifications in SEO and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO), and I am currently studying advanced AI integrations and TailwindCSS.
